metadata.min_stack_comments: Breaking change at 8.14.0 for the Windows Integration.

author: Elastic
rule.description:
Identifies attempts to bypass User Account Control (UAC) via DLL side-loading. Attackers may attempt to bypass UAC to
stealthily execute code with elevated permissions.
rule.name: UAC Bypass Attempt via Privileged IFileOperation COM Interface
tags: Data Source: Microsoft Defender for Endpoint
